Module Simulator
Package kin.render

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
kin.render.Camera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
Definition of a camera including projection, Graphics2D reference to paint on and windows center.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int centerX
    Windows center x.
    int centerY
    Windows center y.
    java.awt.Graphics2D g
    Graphics2D reference to paint on.
    Projection p
    Projection 3D to 2D.

    Create a camera.

      Projection 3D to 2D.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, int width, int height, double cameraX, double cameraY, double cameraZ, double orientationAngle, double horAngle)
      Create a camera.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D reference to paint on
      width - window width
      height - window height
      cameraX - world position (x in cm) of the camera in the plane
      cameraY - world position (y in cm) of the camera in the plane
      cameraZ - world position (z in cm) of the camera in the plane
      orientationAngle - camera orientation angle
      horAngle - camera angle below horizon

  • Method Details

    • drawPoly

      public void drawPoly​(double[][] poly2D, java.awt.Color borderColor, java.awt.Color fillColor, double thickness)
      Draw a closed polygon given in pixel coordinates. Last and first point must not be equal.
      Parameters:
      poly2D - poly in pixel coordinates with (0, 0) in screen center
      borderColor - polygon's border color or null
      fillColor - polygon's fill color or null
      thickness - polygon's border thickness in pixels

    • drawLine

      public void drawLine​(double[] p1_2D, double[] p2_2D, java.awt.Color lineColor, double thickness)
      Draw a line given in pixel coordinates.
      Parameters:
      p1_2D - first line point in pixel coordinates with (0, 0) in screen center
      p2_2D - second line point in pixel coordinates with (0, 0) in screen center
      lineColor - line color
      thickness - line thickness in pixels
